attributes.action: MPs should take a conclusive, parliamentary vote on the UK's potential EU exit.
attributes.additional_details:
This petition does not disregard the views of leave voters. It asks that  Geoffrey Robertson QC's legal advice in the media yesterday* is followed for the future prosperity and stability of the UK & European states.

*"It's the right of MPs alone to make or break laws, and the peers to block them. So there's no force whatsoever in the referendum result"
 http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/brexit-loophole-eu-referendum-mps-law-legal-legislation-constitution-a7105181.html
attributes.background: We ask MPs to reconsider the EU referendum result with advice from an independent, knowledgeable international panel & take a conclusive, parliamentary vote. Such a radical, under-prepared exit with far-reaching consequences shouldn't be made with a slim vote margin nor without leadership in place.
